 13: /**
 14:  * Check PHP configuration.
 15:  */
 16: if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.2.0', '<')) {
 17:     throw new Exception('dibi needs PHP 5.2.0 or newer.');
 18: }
 19: 
 20: @set_magic_quotes_runtime(FALSE); // intentionally @

 45: /**
 46:  * Interface for database drivers.
 47:  *
 48:  * This class is static container class for creating DB objects and
 49:  * store connections info.
 50:  *
 51:  * @author     David Grudl
 52:  * @package    dibi
 53:  */
 54: class dibi
 55: {
 56:     /** column type */
 57:     const TEXT = 's', // as 'string'
 58:         BINARY = 'bin',
 59:         BOOL = 'b',
 60:         INTEGER = 'i',
 61:         FLOAT = 'f',
 62:         DATE = 'd',
 63:         DATETIME = 't',
 64:         TIME = 't';
 65: 
 66:     const IDENTIFIER = 'n';
 67: 
 68:     /** @deprecated */
 69:     const FIELD_TEXT = dibi::TEXT,
 70:         FIELD_BINARY = dibi::BINARY,
 71:         FIELD_BOOL = dibi::BOOL,
 72:         FIELD_INTEGER = dibi::INTEGER,
 73:         FIELD_FLOAT = dibi::FLOAT,
 74:         FIELD_DATE = dibi::DATE,
 75:         FIELD_DATETIME = dibi::DATETIME,
 76:         FIELD_TIME = dibi::TIME;
 77: 
 78:     /** version */
 79:     const VERSION = '2.1.1',
 80:         REVISION = '2c3fe68 released on 2013-10-16';
 81: 
 82:     /** sorting order */
 83:     const ASC = 'ASC',
 84:         DESC = 'DESC';
 85: 
 86:     /** @var DibiConnection[]  Connection registry storage for DibiConnection objects */
 87:     private static $registry = array();
 88: 
 89:     /** @var DibiConnection  Current connection */
 90:     private static $connection;
 91: 
 92:     /** @var array  @see addHandler */
 93:     private static $handlers = array();
 94: 
 95:     /** @var string  Last SQL command @see dibi::query() */
 96:     public static $sql;
 97: 
 98:     /** @var int  Elapsed time for last query */
 99:     public static $elapsedTime;
100: 
101:     /** @var int  Elapsed time for all queries */
102:     public static $totalTime;
103: 
104:     /** @var int  Number or queries */
105:     public static $numOfQueries = 0;
106: 
107:     /** @var string  Default dibi driver */
108:     public static $defaultDriver = 'mysql';
109: 
110: 
111:     /**
112:      * Static class - cannot be instantiated.
113:      */
114:     final public function __construct()
115:     {
116:         throw new LogicException("Cannot instantiate static class " . get_class($this));
117:     }
118: 
119: 
120:     /********************* connections handling ****************d*g**/
121: 
122: 
123:     /**
124:      * Creates a new DibiConnection object and connects it to specified database.
125:      * @param  mixed   connection parameters
126:      * @param  string  connection name
127:      * @return DibiConnection
128:      * @throws DibiException
129:      */
130:     public static function connect($config = array(), $name = 0)
131:     {
132:         return self::$connection = self::$registry[$name] = new DibiConnection($config, $name);
133:     }
134: 
135: 
136:     /**
137:      * Disconnects from database (doesn't destroy DibiConnection object).
138:      * @return void
139:      */
140:     public static function disconnect()
141:     {
142:         self::getConnection()->disconnect();
143:     }
144: 
145: 
146:     /**
147:      * Returns TRUE when connection was established.
148:      * @return bool
149:      */
150:     public static function isConnected()
151:     {
152:         return (self::$connection !== NULL) && self::$connection->isConnected();
153:     }
154: 
155: 
156:     /**
157:      * Retrieve active connection.
158:      * @param  string   connection registy name
159:      * @return DibiConnection
160:      * @throws DibiException
161:      */
162:     public static function getConnection($name = NULL)
163:     {
164:         if ($name === NULL) {
165:             if (self::$connection === NULL) {
166:                 throw new DibiException('Dibi is not connected to database.');
167:             }
168: 
169:             return self::$connection;
170:         }
171: 
172:         if (!isset(self::$registry[$name])) {
173:             throw new DibiException("There is no connection named '$name'.");
174:         }
175: 
176:         return self::$registry[$name];
177:     }
178: 
179: 
180:     /**
181:      * Sets connection.
182:      * @param  DibiConnection
183:      * @return DibiConnection
184:      */
185:     public static function setConnection(DibiConnection $connection)
186:     {
187:         return self::$connection = $connection;
188:     }
189: 
190: 
191:     /**
192:      * Change active connection.
193:      * @param  string   connection registy name
194:      * @return void
195:      * @throws DibiException
196:      */
197:     public static function activate($name)
198:     {
199:         self::$connection = self::getConnection($name);
200:     }
201:

203:     /********************* monostate for active connection ****************d*g**/

205: 
206:     /**
207:      * Generates and executes SQL query - Monostate for DibiConnection::query().
208:      * @param  array|mixed      one or more arguments
209:      * @return DibiResult|int   result set object (if any)
210:      * @throws DibiException
211:      */
212:     public static function query($args)
213:     {
214:         $args = func_get_args();
215:         return self::getConnection()->query($args);
216:     }
217: 
218: 
219:     /**
220:      * Executes the SQL query - Monostate for DibiConnection::nativeQuery().
221:      * @param  string           SQL statement.
222:      * @return DibiResult|int   result set object (if any)
223:      */
224:     public static function nativeQuery($sql)
225:     {
226:         return self::getConnection()->nativeQuery($sql);
227:     }
228:

231:      * Generates and prints SQL query - Monostate for DibiConnection::test().

233:      * @return bool
234:      */
235:     public static function test($args)
236:     {
237:         $args = func_get_args();
238:         return self::getConnection()->test($args);
239:     }

242:     /**
243:      * Generates and returns SQL query as DibiDataSource - Monostate for DibiConnection::test().
244:      * @param  array|mixed      one or more arguments
245:      * @return DibiDataSource
246:      */
247:     public static function dataSource($args)
248:     {
249:         $args = func_get_args();
250:         return self::getConnection()->dataSource($args);
251:     }
252: 
253: 
254:     /**
255:      * Executes SQL query and fetch result - Monostate for DibiConnection::query() & fetch().
256:      * @param  array|mixed    one or more arguments
257:      * @return DibiRow
258:      * @throws DibiException
259:      */
260:     public static function fetch($args)
261:     {
262:         $args = func_get_args();
263:         return self::getConnection()->query($args)->fetch();
264:     }
265: 
266: 
267:     /**
268:      * Executes SQL query and fetch results - Monostate for DibiConnection::query() & fetchAll().
269:      * @param  array|mixed    one or more arguments
270:      * @return array of DibiRow
271:      * @throws DibiException
272:      */
273:     public static function fetchAll($args)
274:     {
275:         $args = func_get_args();
276:         return self::getConnection()->query($args)->fetchAll();
277:     }
278: 
279: 
280:     /**
281:      * Executes SQL query and fetch first column - Monostate for DibiConnection::query() & fetchSingle().
282:      * @param  array|mixed    one or more arguments
283:      * @return string
284:      * @throws DibiException
285:      */
286:     public static function fetchSingle($args)
287:     {
288:         $args = func_get_args();
289:         return self::getConnection()->query($args)->fetchSingle();
290:     }
291: 
292: 
293:     /**
294:      * Executes SQL query and fetch pairs - Monostate for DibiConnection::query() & fetchPairs().
295:      * @param  array|mixed    one or more arguments
296:      * @return string
297:      * @throws DibiException
298:      */
299:     public static function fetchPairs($args)
300:     {
301:         $args = func_get_args();
302:         return self::getConnection()->query($args)->fetchPairs();
303:     }

307:      * Gets the number of affected rows.
308:      * Monostate for DibiConnection::getAffectedRows()
309:      * @return int  number of rows
310:      * @throws DibiException
311:      */
312:     public static function getAffectedRows()
313:     {
314:         return self::getConnection()->getAffectedRows();
315:     }

319:      * Gets the number of affected rows. Alias for getAffectedRows().
320:      * @return int  number of rows
321:      * @throws DibiException
322:      */
323:     public static function affectedRows()
324:     {
325:         return self::getConnection()->getAffectedRows();
326:     }

329:     /**
330:      * Retrieves the ID generated for an AUTO_INCREMENT column by the previous INSERT query.
331:      * Monostate for DibiConnection::getInsertId()
332:      * @param  string     optional sequence name
333:      * @return int
334:      * @throws DibiException
335:      */
336:     public static function getInsertId($sequence=NULL)
337:     {
338:         return self::getConnection()->getInsertId($sequence);
339:     }
340: 
341: 
342:     /**
343:      * Retrieves the ID generated for an AUTO_INCREMENT column. Alias for getInsertId().
344:      * @param  string     optional sequence name
345:      * @return int
346:      * @throws DibiException
347:      */
348:     public static function insertId($sequence=NULL)
349:     {
350:         return self::getConnection()->getInsertId($sequence);
351:     }

355:      * Begins a transaction - Monostate for DibiConnection::begin().

357:      * @return void
358:      * @throws DibiException
359:      */
360:     public static function begin($savepoint = NULL)
361:     {
362:         self::getConnection()->begin($savepoint);
363:     }

367:      * Commits statements in a transaction - Monostate for DibiConnection::commit($savepoint = NULL).

369:      * @return void
370:      * @throws DibiException
371:      */
372:     public static function commit($savepoint = NULL)
373:     {
374:         self::getConnection()->commit($savepoint);
375:     }

381:      * @return void

383:      */
384:     public static function rollback($savepoint = NULL)

386:         self::getConnection()->rollback($savepoint);

400:     /**
401:      * Import SQL dump from file - extreme fast!
402:      * @param  string  filename
403:      * @return int  count of sql commands
404:      */
405:     public static function loadFile($file)
406:     {
407:         return self::getConnection()->loadFile($file);
408:     }

411:     /**
412:      * Replacement for majority of dibi::methods() in future.
413:      */
414:     public static function __callStatic($name, $args)
415:     {
416:         //if ($name = 'select', 'update', ...') {
417:         // return self::command()->$name($args);
418:         //}
419:         return call_user_func_array(array(self::getConnection(), $name), $args);
420:     }

429:     public static function command()

432:     }

435:     /**
436:      * @param  string    column name
437:      * @return DibiFluent
438:      */
439:     public static function select($args)
440:     {
441:         $args = func_get_args();
442:         return call_user_func_array(array(self::getConnection(), 'select'), $args);
443:     }
444:

452:     {
453:         return self::getConnection()->update($table, $args);
454:     }

482:      * @deprecated
483:      */
484:     public static function datetime($time = NULL)
485:     {
486:         trigger_error(__METHOD__ . '() is deprecated; create DateTime object instead.', E_USER_WARNING);
487:         return new DibiDateTime($time);
488:     }

501:     /********************* substitutions ****************d*g**/
502: 
503: 
504:     /**
505:      * Returns substitution hashmap - Monostate for DibiConnection::getSubstitutes().
506:      * @return DibiHashMap
507:      */
508:     public static function getSubstitutes()
509:     {
510:         return self::getConnection()->getSubstitutes();
511:     }
512: 
513: 
514:     /** @deprecated */
515:     public static function addSubst($expr, $subst)
516:     {
517:         trigger_error(__METHOD__ . '() is deprecated; use dibi::getSubstitutes()->expr = val; instead.', E_USER_WARNING);
518:         self::getSubstitutes()->$expr = $subst;
519:     }
520: 
521: 
522:     /** @deprecated */
523:     public static function removeSubst($expr)
524:     {
525:         trigger_error(__METHOD__ . '() is deprecated; use unset(dibi::getSubstitutes()->expr) instead.', E_USER_WARNING);
526:         $substitutes = self::getSubstitutes();
527:         if ($expr === TRUE) {
528:             foreach ($substitutes as $expr => $foo) {
529:                 unset($substitutes->$expr);
530:             }
531:         } else {
532:             unset($substitutes->$expr);
533:         }
534:     }
535: 
536: 
537:     /** @deprecated */
538:     public static function setSubstFallback($callback)
539:     {
540:         trigger_error(__METHOD__ . '() is deprecated; use dibi::getSubstitutes()->setCallback() instead.', E_USER_WARNING);
541:         self::getSubstitutes()->setCallback($callback);
542:     }
543: 
544: 
545:     /********************* misc tools ****************d*g**/
546: 
547: 
548:     /**
549:      * Prints out a syntax highlighted version of the SQL command or DibiResult.
550:      * @param  string|DibiResult
551:      * @param  bool  return output instead of printing it?
552:      * @return string
553:      */
554:     public static function dump($sql = NULL, $return = FALSE)
555:     {
556:         ob_start();
557:         if ($sql instanceof DibiResult) {
558:             $sql->dump();
559: 
560:         } else {
561:             if ($sql === NULL) {
562:                 $sql = self::$sql;
563:             }
564: 
565:             static $keywords1 = 'SELECT|(?:ON\s+DUPLICATE\s+KEY)?UPDATE|INSERT(?:\s+INTO)?|REPLACE(?:\s+INTO)?|DELETE|CALL|UNION|FROM|WHERE|HAVING|GROUP\s+BY|ORDER\s+BY|LIMIT|OFFSET|SET|VALUES|LEFT\s+JOIN|INNER\s+JOIN|TRUNCATE';
566:             static $keywords2 = 'ALL|DISTINCT|DISTINCTROW|IGNORE|AS|USING|ON|AND|OR|IN|IS|NOT|NULL|LIKE|RLIKE|REGEXP|TRUE|FALSE';
567: 
568:             // insert new lines
569:             $sql = " $sql ";
570:             $sql = preg_replace("#(?<=[\\s,(])($keywords1)(?=[\\s,)])#i", "\n\$1", $sql);
571: 
572:             // reduce spaces
573:             $sql = preg_replace('#[ \t]{2,}#', " ", $sql);
574: 
575:             $sql = wordwrap($sql, 100);
576:             $sql = preg_replace("#([ \t]*\r?\n){2,}#", "\n", $sql);
577: 
578:             // syntax highlight
579:             $highlighter = "#(/\\*.+?\\*/)|(\\*\\*.+?\\*\\*)|(?<=[\\s,(])($keywords1)(?=[\\s,)])|(?<=[\\s,(=])($keywords2)(?=[\\s,)=])#is";
580:             if (PHP_SAPI === 'cli') {
581:                 if (substr(getenv('TERM'), 0, 5) === 'xterm') {
582:                     $sql = preg_replace_callback($highlighter, array('dibi', 'cliHighlightCallback'), $sql);
583:                 }
584:                 echo trim($sql) . "\n\n";
585: 
586:             } else {
587:                 $sql = htmlSpecialChars($sql);
588:                 $sql = preg_replace_callback($highlighter, array('dibi', 'highlightCallback'), $sql);
589:                 echo '<pre class="dump">', trim($sql), "</pre>\n\n";
590:             }
591:         }
592: 
593:         if ($return) {
594:             return ob_get_clean();
595:         } else {
596:             ob_end_flush();
597:         }
598:     }
599: 
600: 
601:     private static function highlightCallback($matches)
602:     {
603:         if (!empty($matches[1])) { // comment
604:             return '<em style="color:gray">' . $matches[1] . '</em>';
605: 
606:         } elseif (!empty($matches[2])) { // error
607:             return '<strong style="color:red">' . $matches[2] . '</strong>';
608: 
609:         } elseif (!empty($matches[3])) { // most important keywords
610:             return '<strong style="color:blue">' . $matches[3] . '</strong>';
611: 
612:         } elseif (!empty($matches[4])) { // other keywords
613:             return '<strong style="color:green">' . $matches[4] . '</strong>';
614:         }
615:     }
616: 
617: 
618:     private static function cliHighlightCallback($matches)
619:     {
620:         if (!empty($matches[1])) { // comment
621:             return "\033[1;30m" . $matches[1] . "\033[0m";
622: 
623:         } elseif (!empty($matches[2])) { // error
624:             return "\033[1;31m" . $matches[2] . "\033[0m";
625: 
626:         } elseif (!empty($matches[3])) { // most important keywords
627:             return "\033[1;34m" . $matches[3] . "\033[0m";
628: 
629:         } elseif (!empty($matches[4])) { // other keywords
630:             return "\033[1;32m" . $matches[4] . "\033[0m";
631:         }
632:     }
633: 
634: }
635:
